name: Tower of the Cryptolich
description:
THIS GAME IS IN EARLY DEVELOPMENT AND INCOMPLETE.

The Cryptolich has seized control of the world's wealth and technology. You are Delta, the only hacker with enough skill to infiltrate the Cryptolich's megatower and save humanity.

This is a retro-style arcade game. Your objective is to find the security servers on each level and unlock them to climb the tower.

  • Arrow keys move.
  • Z key shoots. There's a brief cooldown between shots.
  • X key, if held down, locks your facing direction so you don't turn when you move. This is useful for strafing.

Move next to a security server to unlock it.

You have three lives. Every 10,000 points you earn awards you a bonus life.

Good luck Delta!

Upcoming features:

  • More enemies, including a final boss.
  • Varying level geometry.
  • More sound effects.
  • A high score table.
  • Game controller support.
